    Interaction that represents the action of adding a user to a camp as a camp committee member.

    final class

    Interaction that represents the action creating and saving a reply to some enquiry to the database.

    doSubmitSuggestion
    Interaction that represents the action of creating and saving a suggestion for some camp to the database.
    final class 
    doToggleVisibility
    Interaction that represents the action of changing the visibility of a camp to a value other than its original value.
    class 
    queryCampsMenu
    Interaction that represents the action of giving the user a list of camps to choose from, not filtered by any camp aspect.

    Interaction that represents the action of offering users a list of enquiries on their list to choose from.

    Interaction that represents the action of offering users a list of aspects to filter camps by Effectively serves as a function pointer
    final class 
    querySuggestionsMenu

    Methods in camsAction that return Interaction
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Interaction
    doApproveSuggestion.run(String currentuser, Scanner s, Controller control)
    Requests the controller to edit a camp's details based off a suggestion.
    Interaction
    doChangePassword.run(String currentuser, Scanner s, Controller control)
    Prompts the user for a new password and requests the user controller to change it.
    Interaction
    doDeleteAttendeeRegistration.run(String currentuser, Scanner s, Controller control)
    Requests the controller to remove a bidirectional link between the current user and a camp specified.
    Interaction
    doDeleteCamp.run(String currentuser, Scanner s, Controller control)
    Asks controller for all the camp committee members associated with the camp, and resets their permissions to attendee permissions Requests the controller to remove a camp from its database inclusive of links
    Interaction
    doDeleteEnquiry.run(String currentuser, Scanner s, Controller control)
    Requests the controller to delete an enquiry from the database.
    Interaction
    doDeleteSuggestion.run(String currentuser, Scanner s, Controller control)
    Requests the controller to delete a given suggestion.
    Interaction
    doEditCampDetails.run(String currentuser, Scanner s, Controller control)
    Requests the controller to change the values of one aspect in a camp's camp details.
    Interaction
    doEditEnquiry.run(String currentuser, Scanner s, Controller control)
    Requests the controller to modify the contents of a given enquiry.
    Interaction
    doEditSuggestion.run(String currentuser, Scanner s, Controller control)
    Requests the controller to change the content of a given suggestion.
    Interaction
    doGenerateAttendanceList.run(String currentuser, Scanner s, Controller control)
    Asks controller for a list of users of the requested type and camp details.
    Interaction
    doGeneratePerformanceReport.run(String currentuser, Scanner s, Controller control)
    Asks the controller for a list of camp committee members and their points and generates a csv document displaying them
    Interaction
    doNothing.run(String currentuser, Scanner s, Controller control)
    Function does nothing.
    Interaction
    doRejectSuggestion.run(String currentuser, Scanner s, Controller control)
    Requests suggestion control to delete a suggestion, and directory to also remove it from its database.
    Interaction
    doSubmitAttendeeRegistration.run(String currentuser, Scanner s, Controller control)
    Requests the controller to register the current user as an attendee of a given camp Asks the controller if the camp is full or the user has already joined before requesting.
    final Interaction
    doSubmitCamp.run(String currentuser, Scanner s, Controller control)
    Requests the controller to create and save a camp based off user submitted details.
    Interaction
    doSubmitCommitteeRegistration.run(String currentuser, Scanner s, Controller control)
    Requests the controller to register the current user as a camp committee member of a given camp Asks the controller if the camp committee is full or the user is already part of an existing camp committee or the user has already registered for this camp as another role before requesting.
    Interaction
    doSubmitEnquiry.run(String currentuser, Scanner s, Controller control)
    Prompts the user for an enquiry and requests the controller to save it.
    Interaction
    doSubmitReply.run(String currentuser, Scanner s, Controller control)
    Requests the controller to save a reply by the current user to a given enquiry into the database.
    Interaction
    doSubmitSuggestion.run(String currentuser, Scanner s, Controller control)
    Requests the controller to save a suggestion by the current user on a given camp to the database.
    Interaction
    doToggleVisibility.run(String currentuser, Scanner s, Controller control)
    Requests the controller to modify a camp's visibility between visible and not visible.
    final Interaction
    queryCampsMenu.run(String currentuser, Scanner s, Controller control)
    Gives users the choices.
    Interaction
    queryEnquiriesMenu.run(String currentuser, Scanner s, Controller control)
    Gives choices, if users pick an enquiry that is not their own, finalise it
    final Interaction
    queryFilterCampByMenu.run(String currentuser, Scanner s, Controller control)
    Gives users choices then prompts the user to enter the required value.
    Interaction
    querySuggestionsMenu.run(String currentuser, Scanner s, Controller control)
    Gives users choices.
